mainContentSubtext: Meadowlark is a (currently incomplete) project that aims to be a FREE and open-source DAW for Linux, Mac and Windows. Help us release it by contributing on GitHub!

features.title: Free & Open Source Forever
features.text: No paywalls, micro-transactions, free trials, locked features, or paying for pre-built binaries.

features.title: Parameter fiesta
features.text: Assign macros, LFOs, and envelopes to any parameter.

features.title: Meant to be Flexible
features.text: Easy FX chains, flexible grouping and sends anywhere! Organize your project however you like!

features.title: Wide Plugin Support
features.text: First-class support for the powerful and open-source CLAP plugin format. VST/VST3 plugins are supported as well.

features.title: Customize the uncustomizable
features.text: Fully themeable UI to fit your mood and taste. Create and share your own themes for Meadowlark!

features.title: Built with Love
features.text: Meadowlark is built by a passionate team of musicians who want better and accessible tools for everyone.
